newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Ametek Inc EPS view lifted.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Ametek Inc EPS view lifted.

text.p: Lehman said it raised its earnings estimates for Ametek Inc, which is trading on a when-issued basis after spinning out its water filtration business to Culligan Water Technologies Inc.
-- Analyst Harriet Baldwin raised her 1997 EPS estimate to $1.50 from $1.36 on a pro forma basis.
-- Price target $25 or 14.5 times 1998 EPS forecast of $1.70. Sees long term growth of 14 percent.
